treasury_media.title: Brochure Hua Hin Laguna-Thailand
treasury_media.description: Hua Hin Laguna is situated in the exclusive suburbs of Hua Hin, currently the permanent residence of His Royal Highness King Bummiphol of Thailand. The village is surrounded by mountains, featuring a beautiful scenery for maximum peace of mind. It's located just 10 minutes by car from Hua Hin down town and 5 minutes from the beach! The villas in Hua Hin Laguna are designed to meet European standards, as in high ceilings and double walls separating the lounge from the entrance hall to assure privacy. And also, unlike common Thai homes, the villas at Hua Hin Laguna offer big window walls to the terrace at the back of your house to step down to the garden next to the lagoon. It's there in your beautifully landscaped garden where you can relax and enjoy a magnificent sunset and mountain view. Your dreams will come true at Hua Hin Laguna.

treasury_media.description:
2ndHomes International Company Brochure - International Real Estate - Authorized 2ndHomes Dealer - Financial Services
2ndHomes is a sales organization of International Real Estate in varying beautiful & special parts of the world. Special because of certain characteristics, environments, projects and by interesting capital gains and high R.O.I. of these areas. Mainly targeting new, upcoming areas or emerging markets, specializing in Bali, Brazil, Thailand, Cyprus, Ibiza, Panama and USA (a.o. Trump projects).
With an extensive worldwide portfolio guiding and advising clients during the difficult process of buying international real estate, we're supported by our local rep offices, partners and an international increasing nr. of 2ndHomes authorized dealers.
Offering interesting 'Lifestyle investment opportunities' and holiday homes with great pre- and after sales services is part of the strategy that enables us to be the fastest growing sales organization in the industry. Being co-developer in some cases as well we are now also developing the astonishing luxury eco-friendly villa resort 'Bukit Manis' in Bali.
Our new Financial Services division offers an auxiliary range of alternative funding sources, bank instruments & mortgage services in 50 countries!

treasury_media.title: Brochure Luxury Villa Resort Bukit Manis - Bali
treasury_media.description:
Brochure from our Luxury Villa Resort Bukit Manis (will also be copied in Brazil, Ibiza, Thailand, Malaysia, &  Mexico)
This wonderful new luxury project is a jewel in one of the most beautiful areas in the Bukit-often called the Beverly Hills of Bali-(South Bali), very close to National Park GWK (Garuda Wisnu Kencana), Bvlgari and the Four Seasons Hotel. Situated in a quiet coastal area and is surrounded by expatriate community. It's a development of 2ndHomes in cooperation with Exposure Project Development, thus in Dutch hands. 
We build 2 type of Balinese villas (total 24: 12 one storey and 12 two storey villas) with a big central 'open living', Infinity Pools and unobstructed Indian Ocean views to taste the unique Balinese way of life. Only 13km from the international airport and 1km from Dreamland beach & Golf. The closest beach (Greenball) is just a min. from the resort which is a true paradise to real Bali lovers. 
Also close to the Jimbaran famous beach fish restaurants, Nusa Dua & Tanjung Benoa harbor.
Situated in a area where tourism is hardly present yet to be able to enjoy the quietness of the beautiful surroundings. And yet close enough to reach all other facilities with a 15 min. drive, which is very convenient for rentals. The project will be delivered with Free-Hold title to secure your ownership rights. A true Balinese beauty in its kind...!
More info: http://www.2ndhomes.nl/details.aspx?id=1138&seq=AAST-0098-jhgG

profile_positions.description:
Progressive 'house' club in the early nineties attracting crowds from various cities and even countries to it. Being prioneer in many ways it has gained international recognition and status, even though being forced to stop its activities. Still famous for its icredible theme parties with DJ's from all over the world in an amazing atmosphere and 'family' & 'living room' vibe of which many people still talk about. The legendary Club Exposure!
Out of this activity also grew Exposure DanceMusic. A private music label producing, marketing and selling the first club compilation CD's in the early 90's and its very own artist management company Exposure Agency. 
Club Exposure also gained its recognition as first Dutch organization for 10 years organizing its events in all the famous Ibiza clubs from 1994!

With a genuine American kitchen unique for the Netherlands, decorated in the 50's style, employees dressed like Marilyn Monroe, Elvis, Surpremes, and all of them joining theatrical shows during diner, girls serving on rollerskates, and varying theme nights, this was a true quality blessing for the Dutch scene.
profile_positions.title: Managing & Creative Director

profile_positions.description: Founded in 1984 as my first own business, initially as 1 shop with my own brand of "Off the Wall" sportswear & casual clothes, Vans & Converse Shoes, skateboards, roller- & in-line skates. Setting trends, being a Pioneer with many new trends you might call this as well a 'trendshop'. Out of this little shop grew 3 shops in other cities, a whole sale company and my own atelier. In the same time, out of my own hobby motocross I have designed, created and developed a professional line of "Off the Wall" motocross gear  that has been exported all over the world.
